Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Implement 8 authorized extensions with complete documentation

Implemented 8 extensions following strict non-regression principles:

Extensions:
1. Seasonal flight program management
2. Scheduled vs. off-program flight distinction
3. Aircraft version and configuration tracking
4. Detailed passenger categories \(14 categories, classes, medical needs\)
5. Detailed freight management with dangerous goods \(DGR\)
6. CRV cancellation status with full traceability
7. In-app notification service with multi-channel support
8. Proactive SLA monitoring and alerting system

Technical impact:
- 15 files modified \(minimal changes\)
- 22 new files created \(isolated\)
- 61 new API routes added
- ~4,310 lines of code added
- 2 new MongoDB collections \(programmevolsaisonniers, notifications\)
- 0 database migrations required \(100% backward compatible\)

Documentation:
- 5 complete non-regression justifications \(Extensions 1, 5, 6, 7, 8\)
- 1 final synthesis document \(all 8 extensions\)
- 1 global technical justification with 26 user stories
- All documents in docs/extensions/ and docs/

Key guarantees:
âœ… 100% backward compatibility - all existing documents work without migration
âœ… 100% isolation - each extension in separate files
âœ… 100% reversibility - each extension can be rolled back independently
âœ… 0 destructive modifications - no existing fields modified or deleted
âœ… 0 mandatory dependencies - extensions are optional \(except Extension 8 â†’ 7\)

All extensions validated and production-ready.
